com.simsilica.lemur.core

Interface GuiMaterial

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LightingMaterialAdapter, UnshadedMaterialAdapter

    public interface GuiMaterial
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Wraps a regular JME Material to provide general access to paramaters that a UI would find useful like color, etc.
